remarks: The aleph function has a fixed point.  Similar to Proposition 11.18 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 104, except that we construct an actual example of a fixed point rather than just showing its existence.  See ~ alephfp2 for an abbreviated version just showing existence.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
statement:
alephfplem.1 $e |- H = ( rec ( aleph , _om ) |` _om ) $.
alephfp $p |- ( aleph ` U. ( H " _om ) ) = U. ( H " _om ) $.
